# NSVisualEffectView.BlendingMode.withinWindow

**Case**

A mode that blends and blurs the visual effect view with contents behind the view in the current window only.

## Declaration

```swift
case withinWindow
```

## Discussion

Views using this blending mode must not overlap each other.

## Blend Modes

- **NSVisualEffectView.BlendingMode.behindWindow**: A mode that blends and blurs the visual effect view with the contents behind the window, such as the desktop or other windows.
